reviewText:
This a most amazing series. We would like to watch it straight through but don't want it it end. These people feel like friends.

I would recommend this series to all who like true to life series.  My husband is so like the grandpa in many ways. He truly loves those girls he has raised and Tye comes a close second. The tough exterior is all front.
My dad and the whole family enjoyed this series and it was taken off the channels we are able to get, so I thought this would be a great Christmas Present Surprise.
This show is one of the best I've ever seen.  If you like horses and family you'll love Heartland.  I love Amber Marshall and all of the other actors.
love it
great  great great !!!!
Love having this series to watch at my leisure
excellent series, love the character's & the storyline
Great show! Wonderful and timely shipping!
My husband and Granddaughter love Heartland. Could only find it on Amazon.
LOVE Heatland Love I was able to buy complete season :)
I'd recommend this series for any horse person.

This show is a refreshing change of pace from most television shows these days. Though the plot-lines are often aimed at a younger audience and are quite predictable, it's still a pleasure to watch this program due to the engaging characters portrayed by the talented actors. And the big bonus: A chance to fall in love with a myriad of horses, tame and wild, the incredibly scenic locations near Banf, Alberta, Canada. I continue to be pleasantly surprised by this series. Each season more engaging than the last!
great story line you really start to believe it's a real place and wish I could go there.  Very family FRIENDLY!  Which is nice.  Very rare to hear cussing.

Bought these movies for my daughter and she loved them,
 good price for set !

One of the best series around. I am waiting for the 7th season to be released. If you are looking for good entertainment this is the one. I will be able to watch Heartland several times at my convience.
Love it
Came right away. Thank you and when is season seven on sale?
This series has brought us many enjoyable hours.  Love it!
I really love the Heartland series. It's good family entertainment with great characters and plots and story lines and gorgeous scenery. When will Season 7 be out in DVDs?!!

This is a "MUST watch" TV series for all horse lovers! Perfect for the whole family.
Would make a great gift too!
This is the best Series we have ever purchased. Sure hope another series is in the making. Would recommend highly.
Love them! !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!Great watch them all the time:)) can't wait for number 7th to come out . keeps me grounded!

Heartland is a wonderful family oriented TV series - funny, romantic, entertaining, the family members exemplify real people in real life situations, family values, hard work, and of course, the horses.
A little pricey for me, but got it anyways. Perfect condition, individually wrapped, fast shipping. No scratches or smudges it was all just perfect!

Heartland is wonderful. I really don't know how I missed it for so long!! Everyone in my family loves it too and a lot of the time we watch it together. And argue a lot!! But tjhats fun too!

Thank You!

Finally a series worth watching.  Love the storyline, the setting and the talented work of the cast of actors.  Superior quality of work. Makes me sad and a little ashamed when I think of what the bulk of American TV is like these days. All involved in this series have much about which to be proud.
I don't want it to ever end...very good entertainment...cant wait for season 7.....best clean movie I've seen in a very long time....
Good to have the whole set together to watch when unable to watch locally, Cant wait for sesason 7 and on.

Heartland is the BEST series EVER!  The series is addictive, so having the complete collection, plus the Christmas special is practically a must.  The setting/scenery is breathtaking and the scripts are captivating.  Lots of adventure, action, and romance, yet totally family friendly!  And its hard not to fall in love with horses too!
the wife watched heartland on tv and wanted all in sequence and loves the video set, has watched half of it and extremly happy

I recently purchased the Heartland Year 1-6 DVD's as a Christmas gift for a friend.  She has been ill and while recovering watched the entire series. She loved every episode and said her recuperation was the best ever.

Purchased this as a Christmas gift for my wife, who expressed interest in seeing the series.  She has become a "Heartland" junkie!  She loves the show.  I believe the show is produced for teens,  but she says it is entertaining and clean and the Canadian scenery is beautiful.  It is one of the best received gifts I have ever given.
Another wonderful family saga. I purchased the complete series.
Got it as expected
love it
Love these dvds. This is a fabulous TV show.can't get enought of it. What better than anything on TV.
Bought for granddaughter which she liked.
Good
Best family show ever
Great TV show
Wonderful series!
I love Heartland. Good clean family movies!
